# CFBundleHelpBookFolder

**Property List Key**

The name of the folder containing the bundle’s help files.

## Help

- **CFAppleHelpAnchor**: The name of the bundle’s HTML help file.
- **CFBundleHelpBookName**: The name of the help file that will be opened in Help Viewer.
